The simple facts

What exacttly is wesquare®?

wesquare® is a customized storage service specially devised for Parisian to allow them more space at home or in the workplace. Unlike traditional warehousing which is costly and often a hassle, wesquare® offers an affordable, simple and practical option: no need to run round in circles, we take care of it all.

Who’s it for?

You live in Paris, and like all Parisians, you’re stretched for space in your apartment.
You’re off to live abroad and can’t or don’t want to take your stuff with you.
You’re a student living in a 10 m2 with no closet.
You’re fed up with having to leave your stuff with your parents and want it at your fingertips.
You’re renting out your apartment for a while and don’t want to leave your valuables at the mercy of strangers.
You’re a company boss and getting bogged down with paper files.
You’re refurbishing.
You’re moving.

In short, wesquare® will adapt to your needs. It’s THE answer to your problem: quick, flexible and convenient.

How does it work?

Our service works in 4 simple steps:
  1. You order your Boxes (BlueBox, PenderiBox, ArchivBox) online.
  2. We deliver free of charge and you pack your Boxes
  3. We return free of charge within two weeks to pick up the full Boxes and any Bulky Items that may need collecting.
  4. We store your Boxes, sealed and code-labelled along with any Bulky Items in our secure storage units.
We create a visual catalogue of your belongings. At your own convenience, you can use your user account or phone us to organize retrieving a Box within 48h.

How do I keep track of my stuff?

You just have to logged in your user account, you can edit your inventory and upload an overhead picture of your Boxes if your want.

Where is wesquare® wesquare® available?

wesquare® ccurrently covers all the districts of Paris (75001, 75002, 75003, 75004, 75005, 75006, 75007, 75008, 75009, 75010, 75011, 75012, 75013, 75014, 75015, 75016, 75017, 75018, 75019, 75020) as well as the bordering administrative departments (92, 93 and 94.In view of its success, wesquare® will shortly be extending its services to urban areas elsewhere in Europe.

What’s the best way to get in touch?

Here at wesquare® we pride ourselves on our friendly and understanding attitude. Feel free to contact us by e-mail at contact@we-square.com or call +33 (0)1 82 09 71 79.

What hours do you keep?

If you have any queries at all, our Team will be delighted to help from Monday to Saturday between 8 am and 11 pm.

For deliveries, picking up full boxes or retrieving your belongings, our wesquare® drivers will be happy to comply to your wishes any time from Monday to Saturday between 8 am and 9 pm.

Storing your stuff

What can I store with wesquare®?

Thanks to wesquare® you can store as much stuff as you want and for as long as you need to.
You can use our BlueBoxes, our PenderiBoxes or our ArchivBoxes for your small or medium-sized belongings. We can also store your Bulky Items which are too big for our Boxes.
Here are a few examples of things you can store:
  1. BlueBox: clothes, tools, DVDs, books, toys, ornaments, etc.
  2. PenderiBox: coats, dresses, suits, shirts, skateboards, tennis rackets, picture frames, etc.
  3. ArchivBox: personal files, professional records, drawings, etc.
  4. Bulky Items (KingSize): bikes, skis, snowboards, strollers, tyres, golf clubs, large or small luggage, household appliances, mini-refrigerators, micro-waves, desks/office chairs, small furniture, bedside table, lamps, etc.

How many Boxes will I need?

  • Our BlueBoxes measure 60cm x 40cm x 33cm. A BlueBox can hold up to 130 DVDs or 70 books or 14 pairs of shoes.
  • Our PenderiBoxes measure 50cm x 50cm x 100cm. A PenderiBox can hold up to 5 coats and 15 shirts.
  • Our ArchivBoxes measure 60cm x 40cm x 33cm. An ArchivBox can hold 6 file boxes or 20kg of paper which amounts to 4,000 sheets.
Whatever the number of Boxes you order, you will only be charged for those you actually fill. So you shouldn’t worry about ordering more than you think you may need. If you’re not sure, fill the Formor call us at 01 82 09 71 79.

What sort of Bulky Items can I store?

You can store all the items that will not fit into a Box, but we are not yet able to take really large items (outsize refrigerators, extra-wide sofas, etc.).
If you’re not sure you can contact us either by calling 01 82 09 71 79 or by filling the form (describe the item, its size and proportions and send us pictures).

Can you help me to pack my Box?

Our wesquare® Team is not authorized to fill your Boxes or handle your personal belongings. We can, however, recommend some Paris-based companies you can get in touch with to deal with this for you.

How do I close my BlueBoxes and make them secure?

After packing your BlueBox, you only have to make sure that nothing is sticking out which could stop the flaps from closing properly. Your wesquare® driver will then call to seal up them before taking them to the storage unit.

Is there anything I cannot store with wesquare®?

For safety reasons, you cannot store:
  • perishables, food, liquids
  • animals and other living creatures
  • explosives, weapons or ammunition
  • items which give off smoke or smells
  • any illegal substance or product
  • fuel or inflammable matter, liquids or compressed air
  • chemical products, radioactive matter, biological agents
  • toxic waste or other dangerous material
  • any other toxic substance or matter classified by French law as toxic, inflammable or dangerous

Is there a weight limit per Box?

In order to help our wesquare® drivers and to prevent back injury, please make sure that your packed Boxes do not exceed the authorized weight of 20 kg.

Can I use my own boxes?

No. Our BlueBoxes, WardrobeBoxes and ArchivBoxes are specially designed to shift and store your stuff in the best possible conditions.

Delivery, Pick-Up and Retrieval

How do I plan deliveries, pick-up and retrieval?

With wesquare®, arranging a day and a time slot has never been easier.
  1. To fix a delivery of empty Boxes, simulate the price using the pointers and book online a delivery.
  2. Once your Boxes have been delivered, pack them and organize the pick-up (within 2 weeks after delivery of the empty Boxes) by logging in to your user account.
  3. When you wish to retrieve your belongings, log in to user account and schedule a retrieval.

What are the delivery, pick-up and retrieval times?

The wesquare® Team is at your service and will fit in with your schedule any time from Monday to Saturday between 8 am and 9 pm.

How long does it take to retrieve my stuff?

Any retrieval request will be honoured within 48h.

After receiving my Boxes, how long have I got to pack them?

You have up to 2 weeks to pack them.

After receiving my Boxes, how long have I got to pack them?

You have up to 2 weeks to pack them.

How can I retrieve my stuff?

Simply log onto your user account, select the Box and/or the Bulky Items that you wish to retrieve and select a date and time-slot.

Can I change or cancel a delivery, pick-up or retrieval?

To change or cancel a delivery, pick-up or retrieval, please contact the wesquare® Team.
You can change or cancel free of charge up to 24h before the fixed time and date. After that, you will be charged €19.90.

What if I’m not at home for a delivery, pick-up or retrieval?

If your wesquare® driver cannot find your address or if you are not in at the time and date fixed for delivery, pick-up or retrieval, he will wait 20 minutes and attempt to contact you. If this is not successful, you will be charged €29.90.

Can I retrieve my Boxes at a different address to the one originally used?

Absolutely. We offer a flexible service. We’ll deliver your stuff to the address which suits you best.

What happens once I’ve retrieved my Boxes?

Option 1: Temporary retrieval
If you wish to keep some of your belongings in the Boxes or fill the Boxes again immediately and send them back to storage for a further period, that’s not a problem. The wesquare® driver will wait 30 minutes while you re-pack. If you need longer, you can fix a new pick-up date by logging in to your user account.
Option 2: Permanent retrieval
You want to retrieve all your belongings. Empty the Boxes immediately and hand them back to the wesquare® driver. Should you wish to keep the BlueBoxes, you can purchase them at the following prices 19,90 €.

Prices and payment

How much does wesquare® cost? What’s included in the price?

At wesquare®, we offer our clients a customized service adapted to their needs.

BlueBox: 5.90 €/month
WardrobeBox: 8.90 €/month
ArchivBox: 4.90 €/month
Bulky items #1: 6.90 €/month.
Bulky items #2: 11.90 €/month.
Other: on quote.

The service includes:

  • free delivery of the empty Boxes to the address of your choice;
  • free pick-up of the packed Boxes at the address of your choice;
  • free access to an online inventory of your belongings via your personal page;
  • each Box or bulky item is insured for €150.

For retrieval of your belongings, there is a flat rate of €8.90 for the first Box or Bulky Item, plus €2.50 for every subsequent Box or KingSize Item.

Is there a minimum storage period?

Non. The wesquare® has no minimum storage period.

What if I want to retrieve my stuff before completion of a full month?

You are charged for storage on a monthly basis, starting from day 1 of storage in our storage units. The amount is transferred from your bank account on the same date each month.
You can ask to retrieve your belongings at any date. If, for example, your monthly payment falls on the 10th, and you wish to retrieve your belongings on the 17th, you will be charged for the full amount corresponding to ongoing month.

How can I put an end to my wesquare® contract??

Ending your wesquare® contract is quite simple: you only have to ask to retrieve all your belongings. Once we have got back the empty Boxes, your user account will be cleared from our database and your contract will end.

How do I pay?

We only accept payment by bankers’ cards.
For businesses, however, a SEPA direct debit system can be arranged.
Note that payment for storage is on a monthly basis, starting from day 1 of storage in our storage units. Payment is made by bank transfer each month at the same date.
Should payment fail to be made, there will be no surcharge. However, we will be obliged to retain your belongings until payment has been made. In the case of arrears exceeding a period of 30 days, we will be entitled to sell your belongings. But we sincerely hope not to get to that stage, and kindly request that payments be made punctually.

Safety of belongings and insurance

Where is my stuff stored?

Your belongings are stored in our secure storage units with security cameras in action 24/7. Our units are on the outskirts of Paris, just a few kilometers from the capital.

Just how secure are the storage units?

Wesquare® users appreciate our service because they know we are reliable. Security is our prime concern. We have put a lot into safety equipment and insurance contracts:
  • telesurveillance 24/7
  • an alarm system in the case of break-in or fire
  • all entrances are made of reinforced steel
  • security agents on duty 24/7
  • all storage units are insured
  • all storage units are monitored for temperature and humidity levels
  • all Boxes are sealed and insured

Can I visit the storage units?

In the interests of security, we cannot authorize entry to our storage units.

Will my stuff be insured?

Yes, insurance is included in the price of the contract, to the value of €150 per Box or Bulky Item.

Can I take out insurance fot a higher value?

Yes. wesquare® is a customized service. A higher insurance policy can be drawn up according to requirements.

Do you have the right to open my Boxes?

At wesquare®, the rules of confidentiality are stringent. We have particular respect for privacy. Your Boxes will therefore remain sealed until they are returned to you. We may, however, have cause to open them in the event of safety concerns.

Who are the wesquare® drivers?

Wesquare® drivers are carefully vetted regarding their past record and qualifications. They have all received thorough training in view of providing you with the best possible service.
